hero.subtitle: Let AI be your personal video director. Upload a photo, I'll make it move in ways you never imagined.

guide.title: How to Use

apiNotice.title: API Key Required
apiNotice.description: This tool requires a Google Gemini API Key. Visit
apiNotice.descriptionSuffix: to get a free API Key, then enter it in 'API Settings' at the top right.

step1.title: Upload & Input | Fill Everything at Once
step1.description: After uploading product images or any images, you can fill in the following info (the more you fill, the better AI understands):

supplement.label: Additional Notes
supplement.desc: Tell AI your target audience, brand style, message to convey

startFrame.label: Start Frame
startFrame.desc: Choose whether to use uploaded image as video opening

step1.tip: üí° Tip: Fill all settings at once so you don't need to adjust during the process

step2.title: Strategy Selection | Decide Direction Instantly
step2.description: After analyzing images, AI will provide
items: Visual style description (mood, camera work, effects)
step2.tip: üëâ Choose your favorite option, or refine based on your needs

step3.title: Script Generation | Auto-Generate Complete Script
step3.description: After confirming the strategy, system will auto-generate complete video script, including:

storyboard.label: Storyboard Design
storyboard.desc: Visual description and duration for each scene

step3.tip: You can fine-tune the script here, or proceed directly to video generation

step4.title: Video Generation | One-Click Video Creation
step4.description: After confirming the script, click generate:

generate.label: üé¨ Sequential Generation
generate.desc: System generates each scene and auto-concatenates

progress.label: ‚è±Ô∏è Real-time Progress
progress.desc: View generation status for each scene

guide.apiNote: üí° Tip: Gemini API Key is required for full functionality

apiKeyModal.title: API Settings
apiKeyModal.description: API Key is stored locally in your browser and never sent to any server.
apiKeyModal.descriptionFree: You can enter your own API Key for faster speed and higher quota.

freeMode.title: Free Mode Enabled
freeMode.description: Server has API Key configured, you can use this tool for free.
freeMode.hint: For faster speed or higher quota, you can enter your own API Key.

connected.title: Connected
connected.description: Your API Key is set up. You can start using all features.

required.title: API Key Required
required.description: Please enter your Gemini API Key to use this tool. API Key is stored locally in your browser and never sent to any server.

geminiKey.label: Google Gemini API Key
geminiKey.getKeyLink: Get API Key from Google AI Studio

runwayKey.label: Runway API Key
runwayKey.getKeyLink: Get API Key from Runway ML

upload.title: Create Your AI Short Video
upload.subtitle: Upload images, let AI generate professional short video scripts for you

description.label: Additional Notes
description.placeholder: Tell me your target audience, brand style, message to convey... or say nothing at all
description.hint: e.g., An energetic ad showcasing new sneakers, suitable for Instagram Reels

start.name: Use Image
start.description: Use uploaded image as video starting point
start.hint: Image will be the first frame, AI generates motion from there

none.name: Don't Use
none.hint: No reference image, AI creates entirely from text description

none.name: Standard
none.hint: AI can vary visual elements, pursuing creative diversity

product.name: Product
product.hint: Emphasize product color, shape, design details remain consistent

character.name: Character
character.hint: Emphasize character features, clothing, hairstyle remain consistent

both.name: Full
both.hint: Ensure both product and character visuals stay highly consistent

auto.name: Auto
auto.hint: System automatically decides optimal scene configuration

single.name: Single
single.hint: Single continuous shot, ideal for product showcase

multi.name: Multi
multi.description: Multiple shots combined, for complete ads
multi.hint: Multiple scene combinations, ideal for storytelling

subtle.name: Slow
subtle.hint: Slow and elegant, like premium ads. Great for product close-ups, atmosphere

moderate.name: Natural
moderate.hint: Natural everyday rhythm. Great for vlogs, interactions, lifestyle scenes

dramatic.name: Fast
dramatic.hint: Dynamic and energetic. Great for sports, dance, action scenes

auto.name: Smart
auto.description: AI automatically selects best quality enhancement

commercial.name: Commercial
commercial.hint: Ideal for brand ads, promotional videos

cinematic.name: Cinematic
cinematic.hint: Ideal for storytelling, brand image videos

luxury.name: Luxury
luxury.hint: Ideal for high-end products, premium showcase

editorial.name: Editorial
editorial.hint: Ideal for fashion, beauty, lifestyle content

documentary.name: Documentary
documentary.hint: Ideal for real stories, brand narratives

artistic.name: Artistic
artistic.hint: Ideal for creative content, artistic expression

vertical.tip: Vertical videos are optimal for mobile viewing. The first 3 seconds are crucial for engagement

horizontal.tip: Horizontal videos are ideal for larger screens, showcasing more visual detail

square.tip: Square videos occupy maximum visual space in news feeds

auto.name: Smart
auto.hint: Let AI automatically select the most suitable camera motion based on image content and video style. Great when you're unsure which motion to use.

static.name: Static
static.hint: The camera stays completely still. Perfect for showcasing a single subject with full attention.

push.name: Push
push.hint: Camera subtly moves closer to the center. This micro-motion invites viewers into the frame, great for emphasis or creating intimacy.

pull.name: Pull
pull.hint: Camera subtly moves backward. Creates a sense of space opening up, perfect for revealing scenes or ending shots.

pan_right.name: Pan Right
pan_right.hint: Camera slowly sweeps from left to right. Great for showcasing wide environments or guiding viewer attention rightward.

pan_left.name: Pan Left
pan_left.hint: Camera slowly sweeps from right to left. Great for showcasing wide environments or guiding viewer attention leftward.

tilt_up.name: Tilt Up
tilt_up.hint: Camera slowly tilts from bottom to top. Perfect for showcasing tall objects, buildings, or full-body shots from feet to head.

tilt_down.name: Tilt Down
tilt_down.hint: Camera slowly tilts from top to bottom. Perfect for overview shots, head-to-toe reveals, or creating a reveal effect.

priceEstimate.label: ~{{price}} to chill
priceEstimate.hint: Note: Each generation produces random results. Adjusting parameters may produce different outcomes

analyzing.title: AI is on the move, just relax

generatingScript.title: AI is writing the script
generatingScript.description: (Working hard to turn ideas into words)

suggestions.title: Choose Video Direction
suggestions.subtitle: AI has proposed the following creative directions based on your materials

recommendedSettings.title: AI Recommended Settings
recommendedSettings.subtitle: Automatically recommended based on your image analysis

script.title: Script Preview
script.prepareDescription: After confirming the script, click below to start generating your video
script.exportDescription: Export script prompts for use with Runway, Pika, Kling, and other AI video platforms.
script.adjustPlaceholder: e.g., Make scene 2 slow motion, add product close-up at the end...

video.extendDescription: Describe what comes next, Veo will generate an additional 7 seconds seamlessly.
video.extendPlaceholder: e.g., Camera slowly pulls back to reveal the full landscape...

errors.apiKeyRequired: Please set up API key first
errors.apiKeyInvalid: API key is invalid or expired
errors.pleaseUploadImage: Please upload at least one image

warnings.consistencyWarning: This video exceeds 8 seconds and will use AI extension. Visual consistency between segments may vary.
